title: I Got Banned :(
body: So I fed in the last game I played... like bad and i got banned for "intentional feeding". The reasons why my items were sooo messed up are because, near the end of the game, since I was no help to the team (damage wise) I tried tanking (which isn't the best idea on Azir ) I thought it might've helped the team but it only helped me get banned. Not only that but, even though I told my team "since im not doing shit im gonna tank" and "I'm done with Azir" meaning knew i was doing bad but,they still decided to report me for int'ing. I even told them I was feeding on accident in early game and no ganks later im 2/14 and later ending the game with 2/27. Plus I've spent so much money on League and im really disappointed that hundreds of dollar are down the drain.

replies.body:
Feeding is not an accident
If the opposing laner can kill you once , he can kill you twice .
Azir is late game 
27 deaths in a single game is too much
Riot won't ban you off of a single match , this must be routine

> [{quoted}](name=MaeDoSan,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=numqIIWw,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-02-15T00:54:40.084+0000)
>
> Feeding is not an accident
> If the opposing laner can kill you once , he can kill you twice .
> Azir is late game 
> 27 deaths in a single game is too much
> Riot won't ban you off of a single match , this must be routine

Surprisingly enough that is the only game he fed hard.
I checked him on op.gg
If 27 deaths is what you call fed hard , maybe he wasn't so bad but was still reported before because his team saw him as a reason for their loss
If you believe you were mistakenly banned you can submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and request they manually review your case.

Holy shit lol 27?! Daaaaamn. Lol sorry I know you know it's bad.. I'm just flabbergasted how you could not learn after death number 6 to stay the fuck back. Let alone death 15 or 20. Holy shit man! At least you learned how hard Azir is and now you know to never play him lol.
It's kinda hard not to be seen as intent feeding if you have 27 deaths.
I jumped to conclusions there and it wasnt a perma-ban which is totally my mistake, im so relieved but i do have a suspension but its all good :))))0
